content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column]

Key Features

Save 191 $ with the theme!
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″]

2 design in 1 theme

Special design for SEO Agencies and one more for Digital Marketing Agencies
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Unlimeted Color Various

Change colors what you want
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

2055 icons - save 108$!

1995 icons that cost 98$ + 60 SEO Services Icons that cost 10$ + some free icons and our exclusive PNG icons for SEO services
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

More than 120 Content Blocks

Amazing Customization with Visual Composer and Our Exclusive Content Blocks
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-default” bg_image_new=”2019|https://seolight.secretlab.pw/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/benefits-dark.jpg” css=”.vc_custom_1448000286589{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}” el_class=”features_second_line”][vc_column]

WooCommerce Ready & PREMIUM PLUGIN INCLUDED

Save 191 $ with included plugins and icons
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Revolution Slider plugin – save 14$!

Amazing Revolution Slider included!
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Visual Composer – save 34$!

Flexible Visual Composer included!
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Ultimate Addons for Visual Composer – save 18$!

Flexible Ultimate Addons for Visual Composer included!
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Suppamenu Mega Menu – save 17$!

Convinient Suppamenu plugin included!
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_text_separator title=”Save 83$ for plugins and 108$ for icons!” color=”green” style=”dotted” border_width=”3″ el_class=”save_separator” css=”.vc_custom_1446973896840{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1442652535692{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Lifetime Support

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Powerful Admin Options

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-default” bg_image_new=”2024|https://seolight.secretlab.pw/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/comingsoonbgr.jpg” bg_image_repeat=”no-repeat” bg_image_posiiton=”center top” bg_override=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1452941727416{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 95px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_btn title=”Purchase now!” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-shopping-cart” css_animation=”appear” el_class=”btn btn-default btn-lg” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fthemeforest.net%2Fitem%2Fthe-seo-digital-marketing-agency-wordpress-theme%2F13870880%3Fref%3Dsecretlaboratory||”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
